pages.text: $(li)The Mimicream is a sticky item that can be used to craft a powerful weapon known as the $(l:patchouli:weapons/hemolymph_blaster)Hemolymph Blaster$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mimicube)Mimicubes$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
